name: Simple 2000 Series DC Vol.04: Okaeritsu!: The Renai Adventure
overview: Simple 2000 Series DC Vol.04: Okaeritsu!: The Renai Adventure (SIMPLE 2000シリーズDC Vol.04 おかえり! THE恋愛アドベンチャー) is a visual novel for the Sega Dreamcast. It is a port of the PlayStation game Simple 1500 Series Vol. 81: The Renai Adventure, originally developed by S-Neo. HuneX developed the Sega Dreamcast port one year later.
